member.name: T:System.AggregateException
member.summary: Represents one or more errors that occur during application execution.
member.remarks: is used to consolidate multiple failures into a single, throwable exception object.

member.name: M:System.AggregateException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.AggregateException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

member.name: M:System.AggregateException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

member.name: M:System.AggregateException.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Exception})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with references to the inner exceptions that are the cause of this exception.
member.param: The exceptions that are the cause of the current exception.

member.name: M:System.AggregateException.#ctor(System.Exception[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with references to the inner exceptions that are the cause of this exception.
member.param: The exceptions that are the cause of the current exception.

member.name: M:System.AggregateException.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Exception})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and references to the inner exceptions that are the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exceptions that are the cause of the current exception.

member.name: M:System.AggregateException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and references to the inner exceptions that are the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exceptions that are the cause of the current exception.

member.name: M:System.AggregateException.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Exception})
member.summary: Allocates a new aggregate exception with the specified message and list of inner exceptions.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exceptions that are the cause of the current exception.

member.name: M:System.AggregateException.GetBaseException
member.summary: Returns the that is the root cause of this exception.

member.name: M:System.AggregateException.Flatten
member.summary: Flattens an instances into a single, new instance.
member.remarks: If any inner exceptions are themselves instances of , this method will recursively flatten all of them. The inner exceptions returned in the new will be the union of all of the the inner exceptions from exception tree rooted at the provided instance.

member.name: M:System.AggregateException.ToString
member.summary: Creates and returns a string representation of the current .
member.returns: A string representation of the current exception.

member.name: P:System.AggregateException.InnerExceptions
member.summary: Gets a read-only collection of the instances that caused the current exception.

member.summary: Represents a group of Disposables that are disposed together.

member.summary: Constructs a GroupDisposable from a group of disposables.

member.name: M:System.Disposables.CompositeDisposable.Add(System.IDisposable)
member.summary: Adds a disposable to the GroupDisposable or disposes the disposable if the GroupDisposable is disposed.

member.name: M:System.Disposables.CompositeDisposable.Remove(System.IDisposable)
member.summary: Removes and disposes the first occurrence of a disposable from the GroupDisposable.

member.name: M:System.Disposables.CompositeDisposable.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes all disposables in the group and removes them from the group.

member.name: M:System.Disposables.CompositeDisposable.Clear
member.summary: Removes and disposes all disposables from the GroupDisposable, but does not dispose the GroupDisposable.

member.summary: Determines whether the GroupDisposable contains a specific disposable.

member.summary: Copies the disposables contained in the GroupDisposable to an Array, starting at a particular Array index.

member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the GroupDisposable.

member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the GroupDisposable.

member.name: P:System.Disposables.CompositeDisposable.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of disposables contained in the GroupDisposable.

member.name: P:System.Disposables.CompositeDisposable.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Always returns false.

member.name: T:System.Disposables.RefCountDisposable
member.summary: Represents a disposable that only disposes its underlying disposable when all dependent disposables have been disposed.

member.summary: Creates a disposable that only disposes its underlying disposable when all dependent disposables have been disposed.

member.name: M:System.Disposables.RefCountDisposable.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the underlying disposable only when all dependent disposables have been disposed.

member.name: M:System.Disposables.RefCountDisposable.GetDisposable
member.summary: Returns a disposable that when disposed decreases the refcount on the underlying disposable.

member.summary: Represents a disposable whose underlying disposable can be swapped for another disposable.
